pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connector to 'CouchDB' // Provides an interface to the 'NoSQL' database 'CouchDB' (http://couchdb.apache.org). Methods are provided for managing databases within 'CouchDB', including creating/deleting/updating/transferring, and managing documents within databases. One can connect with a local 'CouchDB' instance, or a remote 'CouchDB' databases such as 'Cloudant' (https://docs.cloudant.com). Documents can be inserted directly from vectors, lists, data.frames, and 'JSON'. Targeted at 'CouchDB' v2 or greater.
